channel.title: Queue/Submit Discussion Thread
channel.description:
The creation of this thread is probably a good idea so that reasonable discussion regarding the state of the queue and/or FM / FoL on this site in general has a legitimate place to go instead of having nowhere legitimate to go, ending up in the queue thread, and annoying reviewers / mods
If you think you might ever have discussion to say about these things, bookmark this thread. I def am going to.
‚ÄîN
[quote="Arete, post:1, topic:79675, full:true"] Hosting -
To host a game please express in this thread that you want to host it. When you do so, please provide the following information: - Your game name - Who is hosting it - Size of your game - Game speed (what are the day/night cycles) - Game type (what category of mafia does it fall under).
A reviewer will be assigned to you after that.
[color=ligblue]Example Format[/color] -
Game Name: D&D Monster Manual Mafia Main Host: Steve from PR Game Size: 13 Game Speed: 36/12 Game Type: Standard
Game Name: Main Host: Game Size: Game Speed: Game Type:
[color=ligblue]Starting[/color] - **[Game Name]**|**[Main Host]**|**[Game Size]**|**[Game Speed]**|**[Game Type]**|**[Start Date]**|**[Reviewer]**| **[AltMod]** | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | |World of Warcraft: Battle for Azeroth version 2.0|KyoDaz|16|48/24|Standard|Signups| Firekitten/sulit| Arete |Greek Mythology FM - Dreaming Gods and Dreaming Titans|Marshal + Derps| 24| 48/24|Standard |After FOL 28|DatBird|DatBird
[color=ligblue]Waiting to Start[/color] - **[Game Name]**|**[Main Host]**|**[Game Size]**|**[Game Speed]**|**[Game Type]**|**[Start Date]**|**[Reviewer]**| [AltMod] | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | |SFoL 62: Regal Lions| Amelia |18 |48/24|SFoL|After WOW|Icibalus|- |Geyde PFPs JOAT9|Geyde|9|48/24|Vanilla|After After Greek|DatBird|N/A |Homestuck FM|Clonedcheese|18|48/24|Standard|After SFOL 62|Sulit|- |SFoL 63: Triple Threat: Virtuous|Amelia + Jane|26|48/24|SFoL|After Geydes PFP|DatBird|N/A| |Town of Salem 2399: The Desolation of Storp|Icibalus|21|48/24|Standard|tbd|Geyde|- NewD3|KyoDaz|9|48/24|Anon Comp|tbd|DatBird|DatBird |JoaT^2|Arete|15|48/24|Vanilla|tbd|DatBird|Arete |Purgatory III: The Reckoning|clonedcheese|18 (9 Slots, 9 Hydra Alt Accounts)|48/48 (Heaven/Hell)|Vanilla| tbd| Dat|-
[color=ligblue]In Review[/color] - **[Game Name]**|**[Main Host]**|**[Game Size]**|**[Game Speed]**|**[Game Type]**|**[Start Date]**|**[Reviewer]**| | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | |Watch Your Mouth!: Sophomore Year|Poisonedsquid + DatBird|18|48/24|Standard|x|Arete| |Rick and Morty FM|ModeShifter|28|48/24|Standard|x|Sulit |SFoL 69 ùïüùïöùïîùïñ: üÖñüÖ°üÖêüÖùüÖì üÖòüÖìüÖîüÖê|Geyde|16+|48/24| SFoL|x|Future DatBird| |SFoL 64: Duel of the Juggernauts|Vulgard|27|48/24|SFoL| x| x| |Apex Legends Season 5 D8 FM|ModeShifter + 0B_Light.| 13| 48/24| Vanilla |x|x |Why people cant have nice things Mafia|Geyde|18+|48/24|Standard|x|Arete |Wild West FM| Marashal + Italy|25|36/12| Vanilla| x|DatBird |Harry Potter Mafia|0B_Light+Magnus|20|24/24|Minimash|x|Geyde |Three in One|Moleland|x|36/24|x| x|x |SFoL 65: Retribution From Heavens|Twil1ight| 21| 48/24| SFoL| x| x| |Flavorless Mad17|Vulgard|17|48/24|Standard (Semi-Open)|x|x |Masquerade Madness|Ami|7|48/24|Anom Vanillia|x|x |SFoL 66: Anonymous FOL|Katze + Arete|18|48/24|SFOL|x|x |Star Wars FM: v1|KyoDaz|30|48/24|Minimash|x|x| |Completly Vanilla Game(Tm)|eevee|13|48/24|Standard|x|x|
[color=ligblue]Work In Process[/color] - **[Game Name]**|**[Main Host]**|**[Game Size]**|**[Game Speed]**|**[Game Type]**|**[Start Date]**|**[Reviewer]**| |-|-|-|-|-|-|-| |JoJos Part 7| DatBird|29|48/24|Minimash|x|x |Forever Evil: DC Comics and the Battle of the Syndicated Supermages|TheBlueElixir| 28| 48/24| Standard| x| x| |Unexpected Turbulence ‚Äî Flight to the Explosive Peak (Mountainous Arson ‚Äì Airplane Flavour)|TBD + N.1 (im puting this here for now because im not going to designate flavour until i have a co-host just in case they care and/or have input, also i will not run this game without a co-host. But it is just standard marson and can be ready whenever.)|15|48/24|Vanilla| x| x|
#### We have a mini queue for Miscs. Basically so we dont have a overboard of them at one time, unlike FM/FOLs they will be not reviewed atm. But still know we are watching for good and appropriate content. If we dont see that we will take misc hosting privileges away as per usual. Also each user may have only 1 misc queued max at a time. Unlike FM just dm DatBird on the forums or discord (check my profile) and I'll add you to the queue and give you an appropriate time to start/
[color=ligblue]Misc[/color] - **[Game Name]**|**[Main Host]**|**[Game Size]**|**[Small Description]**|**[Start Date]**| |-|-|-|-|-|-|-| |BOTF3|Tan+Marshal|14|A forum version of the board game Blood on the Clocktower - Bad Moon Rising.|Ongoing| |Fortified Tower 2|Moleland|10-16|VLDR-esque, but faster pace, with more death, betrayal and traps‚Ä¶ Did I mention traps?|Signups| |Airlock|eevee + N.1|Somewhere around 10 min, 15 max I think|Clocktower in space with other stuff, read OP for details|Signups open after BotF 3 ends, signups close when both 1) at least 10 players have signed up and 2) it has been at least 9 days since signups opened, then the game will lie dormant for a week while we balance and rand (doing this game's balance is dependant on knowing how many people are playing beforehand), and then the game will begin.| |VLDR 2|Sulit + katze|12|Mix of Zero Escape and Danganronpa.|After Tower |Dangan| Alice|16|Alice didn't do it so I get to say that Chihiro is best girl -Dat|July 17th| [/quote]
